episode_summary: In this episode, Scott Salari from Real Sync discusses the importance of integrating real estate technology tools to improve business efficiency. He explains how automation can save time, reduce errors, and ensure no leads fall through the cracks. Scott also shares insights into future developments in real estate tech, including actionable insights from data aggregation.
